description: The number of ahthenticate users is reached the max number.

event.Summary: Maximum authenticated users reached on BRAS

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: 1 Notice/Trap name: Reach the eap port user threshold
2 Notice/Trap generation cause: the number of the online eap user in this port reaches the threshold
